TopicTitle: Why are my posts suddenly requiring moderator approval?

Articles.Content:
I've been on the forums for awhile and posted a fair amount, but suddenly when I try to post it says the post will need to be reviewed by a moderator. In this case it's on Squad's latest announcement relating to sal_vager.

I don't have any notifications or any indications of any kind of infraction, are there some cases where a moderator will mark a thread such that all new posts will need to be approved? Is there some kind of keyword system that would trigger that?

Are there any other things that could trigger this behavior?

Edit: It let me post this no problem, I'm assuming that it's related to that particular thread, but some clarification would still be nice.
For some reason the "Announcements" section requires mod approval for everyone. As far as I know it's always been that way. Why? No idea.
